titleStmt.title: One and forty divine odes Englished set to King Davids princely harpe. By S.P.L.
titleStmt.author: Brazil. Ministério do Interior. Secretaria de Planejamento.
Sempill, James, Sir, 1566-1625, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M[iles] F[lesher and Robert Young for Richard Moore],

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Sir James Sempill.

With an additional title page: An assay, or Buchanan his paraphrase on the first twentie Psalmes of Dauid translated. London, printed by R[obert]. Y[oung]. for Richard Moore in St. Dunstones Church-yard in Fleetstreet. 1627.
Flesher's and Young's names from STC.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
